author: timbeiko
content: The London Mainnet announcement has been updated with the newly released client versions which fix the consensus issue found on Ropsten. You can find the current best version for each client, as well as explanations on the actual issue here: https://blog.ethereum.org/2021/07/15/london-mainnet-announcement/
